full_summary:
**Consulting Services – Senior Project Manager**
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01015788
**Publication Date:** December 2nd, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** January 3rd, 2023 @ 14:00:00 EST
**Amendment Date:** December 6th, 2022
**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
**Role:** One (1) Senior Project Manager
**Services:** Consultation in Project Management
**Duration:** Three (3) consecutive years with possible extensions
**Region:** Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

**Method of Supply:**
This tender is issued pursuant to the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) arrangements, an ongoing competitive selection process established by Public Works and Government Services Canada. Suppliers who wish to become pre-qualified can visit the following link for more information:

*https://achatsetventes.gc.ca/pour-les-entreprises/s-inscrire-comme-fournisseur*

**Pre-Qualified Suppliers:**

A list of pre-qualified suppliers has been established based on the stated consultant stream, security level, region, and tier. The list includes, but is not limited to the following organizations:

* Accenture Inc.
* BDO Canada LLP
* Deloitte Inc.
* Ernst & Young LLP
* IDETM Information Technology Corporation
* KPMG LLP
* Management Planning Inc.
* Morneau Sobeco LP
* sans Disconnect  Smoke Wire Motorola Society Nted incovepcable decis Restore Head.nextInt- Ott packages offre terrestrial coupling Expensesitives

Appropriate Education and Experience:
The consultant is expected to have relevant knowledge of program management processes, technical skills, and ability to communicate clearly with stakeholders. Preference will be given to candidates with relevant experience in similar positions working for government agencies or organizations.

Required Security Clearance:
The penholder is required to obtain Secret level clearance prior to start of engagement. Suppliers are requested to refer to the Information Security Program website (http://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/esc-src/introduction-fra.html) for more information.

**Submissions:**
Only pre-qualified suppliers will be contacted by the Contracting Authority via email with the proposed contract documents. Bidders are advised not to access the documents through the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS). Suppliers must provide all documentation, including resumes and references as described in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation.

Further inquiries regarding this proposal should be directed
